name: Staples
details:
Poudre School District receives low negotiated pricing with Staples, and PSD staff can too by registering for an individual account. A registration link and information on how to use StaplesAdvantage.com is available using the flier link below. 
 
For assistance, contact customer service at 877-826-7755 or using the Customer Support link below. 
 
It takes approximately one to three business days to activate your registration. You'll receive a confirmation email from Staples Advantage to let you know when activation is complete. 
 
Order directly from StaplesAdvantage.com with your personal credit card, and your order will ship UPS® Ground right to your home.
